code: import{ToolsActionTypes}from"../../types/tools";export var setLoading=function setLoading(status){return function(dispatch){dispatch({type:ToolsActionTypes.SET_LOADING,payload:status});};};export var setEditing=function setEditing(checked){return function(dispatch){dispatch({type:ToolsActionTypes.SET_EDIT,payload:checked});};};export var setDialogId=function setDialogId(id){return function(dispatch){dispatch({type:ToolsActionTypes.SET_DIALOG_ID,payload:id});};};
